name: Asia-Europe People's Forum
headAddress: 85-B Masikap Street Extension, Central District, Diliman
goal: AEPF’s goals are to strengthen network building at the national and regional levels in order to undertake cross-regional initiatives and campaignes; analyse issues of common interest such as security, development, human rights, climate change, trade and economic and social policies and their impact on peoples in each region in order to come up with visions and alternative futures; and provide people’s organisations and networks with a channel for critical engagement with the institutions and policies of ASEM-member countries.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Among the EU initiatives or policies that AEPF have been following are on free trade agreements, social cohesion, social protection and on migration.
